trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Anza
There were no other sightings in Anza on or around March 17th 2008
Summary: country road between Temecula and Anza California.
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were coming back from LA and on the country road between Temecula and Anza California. I was the passenger in the car we were driving about 60 mph. I thought a real fast car was passing us because there was no other cars. This is a road where people do drive fast but as I looked back the object was not on the road it quickly cam along side of us flying above the ground about 50 feat. It was on the drivers side but it was so bright but did not hurt my eyes. After a few seconds it whet up in the sky. Then I see on TV they saw something in Texas. I had a doctors appointment and can get the exact date. David Markarian
